title: JEE Main 2024 Syllabus
author: Anand kumar
paragraphs: The JEE Main 2024 syllabus is the same as the previous years. The syllabus is released by the National Testing Agency (NTA) on their website, along with the information brochure covering all the exam details. JEE aspirants are recommended to download the official JEE Main 2024 syllabus PDF to be aware of the topics to learn.
Students can refer to the detailed syllabus provided below. Refer to the official NTA website for the latest updates on the syllabus and exam pattern.

tables.title: JEE Main Exam Pattern (Paper 1)
rows: MCQs and Numerical Questions (for each subject)
{ Correct Answer: +4, Incorrect Answer: -1, Unattempted Answer: 0 }

tables.title: JEE Main Paper 2A & 2B Syllabus (Aptitude Test for B. Arch/B. Planning)
JEE Main Paper 2A & 2B Exam Pattern
rows: { Maths: 20 MCQs & 10 Numerical, Aptitude: 50 MCQs, Drawing: 2 Questions, Planning: 25 MCQs (B.Plan only) }
{ MCQ: Correct: +4, Incorrect: -1, Unattempted: 0, Drawing: Total 100 Marks }
